title: Skate or Die, Ski or Die and Thrashin' fonts?
content:
I'm looking for the fonts used on the titles on the covers of Ski or Die and Skate or Die videogames, or other similar late 1980's / early 1990's fonts.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130213201944im_/http:/typophile.com/files/236825-ski_or_die_large_5238.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130213201944im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sk8ordie_6166.jpg)

Also looking for the font used on the movie poster below or something similar.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130213201944im_/http:/typophile.com/files/9ebf_thrashin_5920.jpg)
author: forlan

comments.content: Those are all lettering. If you want the right look, you're going to have to draw it. Even if you can't draw it'll look good because those were made to look bad!

Yeah they most likely didn't use any existing fonts, info on something similar would still be greatly appreciated.

Also looking for something similar to the font on Virgin Airlines logo. Found out that there was a font called VirginAirlines or something made by some aeroplane enthusiast but that it hasn't been uploaded anywhere since 2005 or so.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130213201944im_/http:/typophile.com/files/VirginLogo_4820.gif)
